findings.title: Owner can withdraw foreign tokens from contract
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to withdraw foreign tokens from the contract.

findings.title: Owner can change operators map
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the operators map.

findings.title: Operators can record referrals
findings.description: Operators have the privilege to record referrals without any restrictions.

findings.title: Operators can record referral commission
findings.description: Operators have the ability to record referral commissions, which may lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: Owner can mint
findings.description: The owner of SabertoothToken has the privilege to mint tokens.

findings.title: Fee address can fee addresses
findings.description: The fee address has the capability to set or update other fee addresses.

findings.title: Dev address can dev addresses
findings.description: The Dev address has privileges to modify other dev addresses.

findings.title: Owner can add pool
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to add a new pool in the MasterChef contract.

findings.title: Owner can change allocation points of pool
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the allocation points of a pool in the MasterChef contract.

findings.title: Owner can change deposit fee of pool
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the deposit fee of a pool, which could lead to potential security risks.

findings.title: Owner can change harvest interval of pool
findings.description: The contract owner has the privilege to modify the harvest interval of a pool, which may lead to unintended consequences.

findings.title: Owner can change emission rate
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the emission rate of a pool.

findings.title: Owner can change referral contract address
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to change the referral contract address, which could lead to potential security issues.

findings.title: Owner can change referral commission rate (less then 10%)
findings.description: The owner has the privilege to modify the referral commission rate which is less than 10%

findings.title: Inconsistent User Amount Update
findings.description: The deposit() function updates user.amount by adding transferred tokens, but lpToken may deduct taxes on transfer, resulting in a different real user.amount.

findings.title: Unbounded Loop in massUpdatePools() Function
findings.description: The function massUpdatePools() in MasterChef contract uses a loop to update all pools, which can cause an OUT_OF_GAS exception if the pool list is too long.
